faction_profile.name: 제갈세가 (Zhuge Family / 諸葛世家)
alias: 신기제갈 (Divine Strategy Zhuge / 神機諸葛)

location.landmark: Mt. Yungjung (융중산 / 隆中山) - Symbolic retreat/training ground.
location.residence_type: Grand Manor in the city (Practicality) vs Thatched Cottage on the mountain (Symbolism).

faction_profile.political_stance: Orthodox (Jeongpa). Core pillar of the Murim Alliance (often holding the position of Chief Strategist).

weaknesses: Physical Frailty: Often depicted with weak constitutions or average skeletal structure.
Reliance on tools/formations over raw brute force.

combat_style.signature_weapon: Fan (Folding Fan) - often concealing hidden weapons or made of steel.
combat_style.tactics: Luring enemies into traps, using psychological warfare, attacking vital points with needles.

finger: 탄지신통 (Tan-ji-sin-tong / Flicking Finger Divine Skill) - *Signature Move*

hidden_weapons.concept: Used for defense or surprise attacks via medical knowledge (needles).

formations_and_spells.description: The true power of the Zhuge Family. Can trap or kill stronger enemies.
list: 태극건곤환상진 (Taiji Heaven and Earth Illusion Formation)

narrative_role: The 'Brain' of the party or Alliance.
Provides exposition on mysteries, ancient texts, or enemy weaknesses.
A glass cannon character who needs protection but solves impossible puzzles.
Often portrayed as handsome scholars holding a feather fan.
